name: Rhodes Scholarship
description: The Rhodes Scholarship is a prestigious international scholarship program enabling outstanding students from around the world to study at the University of Oxford.
address: Rhodes House, South Parks Road, Oxford OX1 3RG, United Kingdom

name: Fulbright Program
description: The Fulbright Program is an international educational exchange program that provides grants for students to study, research, or teach abroad.
address: Fulbright Commission, Washington D.C., United States

name: Chevening Scholarship
description: The Chevening Scholarship is the UK government's global scholarship program to study in the United Kingdom, aimed at developing global leaders.
address: Chevening Secretariat, Foreign, Commonwealth & Development Office, London, United Kingdom

name: DAAD Scholarship
description: The DAAD Scholarship offers highly qualified international students the opportunity to study in Germany in various academic fields.
address: German Academic Exchange Service, Kennedyallee 50, 53175 Bonn, Germany

name: Gates Cambridge Scholarship
description: The Gates Cambridge Scholarship provides full-cost scholarships to students from outside the United Kingdom to pursue postgraduate study at the University of Cambridge.
address: The Gates Cambridge Trust, University of Cambridge, Cambridge CB2 1TN, United Kingdom
